detail_desc: Leggings in glossy jersey with an elasticated waist, zip fly and press-stud, and back pockets.
5-pocket trousers in washed, slightly stretchy twill with a regular waist, zip fly and skinny legs. Skinny fit.

Coat in an Italian wool blend with notch lapels, buttons down the front and decorative buttons at the cuffs. Decorative chest pocket, welt side pockets with a flap, one inner pocket and a single back vent. Lined. The wool content of the coat is recycled.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.

Dress in a viscose weave with a collar, button placket, chest pocket with a button, pockets in the side seams and long sleeves with a tab and button. Braided imitation suede belt and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and one back pocket. Tapered legs with ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
T-shirt in a jacquard-knit cotton blend with short sleeves, an open chest pocket and slits in the sides.

Long dress in an airy weave in a narrow cut at the top with short, narrow shoulder straps and an opening with a tie at the back of the neck. Narrow elasticated seam at the waist and a straight-cut, softly draping skirt. Lined.

Suit trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Diagonal side pockets, jetted back pockets with a button, and legs with creases. Super skinny fit – a fit with slightly shorter legs that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a completely fitted silhouette.
Dress in soft, washed denim and a pair of leggings in jersey. Dress with buttons down the front, long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, and a flared skirt. Leggings with an elasticated waist.
Pyjamas in soft cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Bottoms with an elasticated waist.
Boxer briefs in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist and a decorative bow at the front. Lined gusset.

Glittery trainers with a print motif, embroidery and appliqués. Transparent soles with flashing LED lights in different colours that activate when you move. Adjustable hook and loop tabs at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and patterned soles.
Shorter polo-neck jumper in a rib knit containing some wool with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and roll-edges around the neck, cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in soft jersey made from a cotton blend with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Short, straight-cut dress in woven fabric with a V-neck, narrow shoulder straps and decorative crossover straps at the back. Lined.
Ankle-length trousers in a patterned weave with a regular waist, zip fly and press-stud, side pockets and straight legs.
Narrow, satin-covered Alice band with a glittery flamingo on top with a fluffy tulle body.
Fitted top in stretch, ribbed cotton jersey with a round neck and long sleeves.
Long, round-necked T-shirt in soft jersey with a curved hem.
Metal signet rings in various designs.
Captain’s cap with a band at the front. Lined.

Long shirt in a soft cotton weave with a collar, concealed button placket at the front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with gathered, buttoned cuffs, a wide, detachable tie belt at the waist, and a rounded hem.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside. The cotton content of the joggers is organic.

Shirt in cotton twill with a soft finish, print front and back and embroidered appliqués on the chest, sleeves and back. Collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a hook and loop fastening and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.
Leggings in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Microfibre body with a gentle sculpting effect on the waist, hips, back and bum. Push-up bra with underwired, moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps, an opening and hook-and-eye fastening at the back and laser-cut hems for a smooth silhouette. Lined gusset with a press-stud fastening.
Sleeveless dress in a cotton weave with buttons at the back and flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Partly lined.
Wide trousers in cotton twill with a high waist, pleats at the top and wide legs with close-fitting hems. Covered elastication at the back of the waist and front and back pockets.
Vest top in ribbed jersey made from a cotton and silk blend jersey.
Long, padded jacket with a hood, zip and concealed press-studs down the front, and side pockets. Polyester filling.

Knee-length shirt jacket in a soft weave containing some wool with a collar, buttons down the front, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Flap chest pockets, pockets in the side seams, and a rounded hem. Unlined. The polyester and wool content of the shirt jacket is recycled.
Lined bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps with a metal decoration, and a metal fastener at the back.
Dress in a soft weave with a small stand-up collar, button placket and flounces at the top. Long sleeves with narrow, buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a softly draping, flared skirt. Unlined.

Boots in waterproof functional fabric with imitation leather details, a padded, patterned ankle-height shaft, lacing at the front, a zip in the side and reflective details. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Tops in lightweight cotton sweatshirt fabric, one printed. Long raglan sleeves, press-studs at the back of one shoulder and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Platform ankle boots in glossy imitation leather with lacing at the front. Fabric linings and insoles. Heel 10.5 cm, platform front 2 cm.
Straight-cut, off-the-shoulder blouse in a softly draping weave with a sheen. Wide, covered elastication at the top and short raglan sleeves.
Trainers in imitation leather with lacing at the front, mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
Cropped top in heavy jersey with a square neckline and long puff sleeves.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress woven in an airy Tencel™ lyocell blend with adjustable spaghetti shoulder straps and a seam below the bust. Concealed zip in one side and a flared, tiered skirt. Satin lining.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist, diagonal side pockets and gently tapered legs with elasticated hems. Brushed inside.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a long-sleeved top and trousers in a soft, fine knit made from organic cotton. Top with raglan sleeves, buttons at the front, and roll-edge cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated drawstring waist and roll-edge hems.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey.

Sleeveless blouse in a viscose weave with a small, frill-trimmed stand-up collar with ties. V-neck with buttons at the front, decorative gathers at the back and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Long beach kaftan in an airy weave with a V-neck front and back and high slits in the sides.
Short dress in a viscose weave with an opening and covered button at the back of the neck, elasticated seam at the waist and 3/4-length sleeves with a slit at the cuffs. Unlined.
Short top in a ribbed viscose blend with a round neck and short sleeves.

Short skirt in seersucker made from a viscose blend with a high waist and concealed zip at the back. Gathered seam front and back to create a draped effect and two tiers of asymmetric flounces at the hem. Lined.
Leggings in soft sweatshirt fabric. Skinny fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cotton with a cable-knit front, decorative bow at the neck and lace trim at the hem. Narrow ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Slim-fit jeans in stretch, supersoft denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.
Trousers in woven fabric with a high waist, hook-and-eye fasteners and zip fly. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Short, fitted dress in gathered jersey with long raglan sleeves and a concealed zip at the back.

Single-breasted jacket in a stretch weave with narrow notch lapels and a decorative buttonhole. Open chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. One button at the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Skinny fit – a slightly shorter style that shapes in at the chest and tapers sharply at the waist. This combined with narrow shoulders and sleeves creates a completely fitted silhouette.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Joggers in airy, lightweight jersey made from an organic cotton blend with an elasticated drawstring waist, pockets in the side seams and ribbed hems.
Fully lined, patterned swimsuit with a flounced trim at the top and narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back.

Tuxedo trousers in a jacquard-weave cotton blend with a concealed hook-and-eye fastening and zip fly. Discreet pockets in the side seams, jetted back pockets and legs with creases. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Wide, cropped T-shirt in cotton jersey.
CONSCIOUS EXCLUSIVE. Shoulder necklace made partly from recycled metal with coral-shaped chains decorated with faceted glass rhinestones. Clasp at the back of the neck.
Jumper in a textured, premium cotton knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Water bottle in glass with a silicone grip, metal screw top and fabric strap. Capacity 400 ml.
Long-sleeved T-shirt in waffled cotton jersey with ribbed cuffs.
Sunglasses with matt plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and a welt back pocket.
Socks in a soft fine-knit with elasticated tops.
Jacket in sweatshirt fabric with a lined drawstring hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Oversized jacket in sturdy, felted jersey with narrow notch lapels and a concealed press-stud at the front. Large patch pockets and a single back vent. Unlined.
Polo shirt in cotton piqué with a grandad collar, button placket, short sleeves with ribbed trims, and slits in the sides.
V-neck top in satin with a lace trim at the top, narrow shoulder straps and a lace racer back with covered buttons.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with concealed buttons down the front and a collar with appliqués. Long puff sleeves with buttoned cuffs, a seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Unlined.
Treggings in imitation leather with an elasticated waist.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waist panel.
Top in light sweatshirt fabric with a wider neckline, dropped shoulders and short, wide sleeves. Rolled, raw edges around the neckline, sleeves and hem.
Microfibre bra with a scalloped trim at the top and underwired padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless dress in printed cotton jersey with a gathered seam at the waist and flared skirt.
Fitted jacket in fast-drying, thermal fleece with a drawstring hood and zip down the front. Mesh-lined side pockets with a zip, and thumbholes at the cuffs.
